data.actual_result: It's reset to previous window size
data.expected_result: Discord remember last text chat window size
data.short_description: Discord does not remember text chat window size
data.steps_to_repro: - Open Discord overlay text chat - Reposition (and/or resize) text chat window - After resize, close overlay and reopen it - NOTE: If this does not reproduce, try it again a few times (with different position and size combination)
